# Reshaping Data for Dashboards

This notebook shows how to pivot indicator data from wide to long for easier analysis and visualization.

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)

df <- read.csv("indicator_wide_format.csv")
long_df <- df %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("edu_"):starts_with("health_"),
               names_to = "indicator",
               values_to = "value")
head(long_df)
```

## Summarize

```{r}
summary_table <- long_df %>%
  group_by(indicator) %>%
  summarise(mean_value = mean(value))

print(summary_table)
```
